div.p: This implementation guide provides resources and discussion in support of applying the WHO recommendations on antenatal care for a positive pregnancy experience:

p.a: WHO recommendations on antenatal care for a positive pregnancy experience

div.p: Note that the content of this implementation guide is draft material that has not yet been tested or validated for use in production environments.
This implementation guide includes support for the following guideline recommendations:

li.a: Recommendation-A.2 - Iron and folic acid supplements
